name: Iron Dungeon (purmalis)
description:
NOTE: this is a demo version!

Iron Dungeon combines a twin stick shooter and a 2d platformer, seasoned with roguelike elements.

Buried under the ruins of civilization, the underground military complex has awakened, and resumed the production and training of combat clones.

Explore the premises of the complex in search of dozens of weapons and upgrades, fight enemies and pave your way to the surface to find out if there is still life on Earth!

Standing still is dangerous!

Dodge bullets and aim well to survive!

Do not spare your enemies, because for defeating them you will receive precious shards that can be spent on improvements.

Activate platforms and jump boosters in order to get to the most inaccessible corners of the underground maze.

To get particularly valuable items, you will have to show accuracy, speed and skill.

You never know which maze you will find yourself in next!

Dozens of random items are waiting for you to help you survive and advance further.

However, if you die, you will have to start from the beginning. And yes, no meta-progression, just your skill and a little luck!

DOWNLOAD PRESS KIT
